title: Posh sausage roll
description: A delicious mixture of minced pork, spices, apricot and nuts is baked in pastry and served with braised cabbage with apple and tamarind sauce. A meal in itself, or it can be served alongside the turkey as part of the Christmas dinner!
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 sheet all-butter puff pastry rolled to a 1cm/½in thickness, 50cm/20in length and 25cm/10in width
2 large pears apple, peeled and diced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
pear sliced on a mandoline, to garnish
